arm_group.arm_group_label: Plant-based ingredient to a starchy meal

brief_summary.textblock:
The study is designed to determine the extent to which foods containing a plant-based
      ingredient affect blood glucose and hormonal response in healthy subjects.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of a Plant-based Ingredient on Generalized Hormonal Responses

arm_group_label: Plant-based ingredient to a starchy meal
Plant-based ingredient to a starchy meal

clinical_study.official_title: Effect of a Plant-based Ingredient on Generalized Hormonal Responses

oversight_info.authority: France: Agence Nationale de Sécurité du Médicament et des produits de santé

primary_outcome.description: Glucose-dependent insulinotropic peptide (gastric inhibitory polypeptide, GIP) (total) will be assessed.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Glucose-dependent insulinotropic peptide (gastric inhibitory polypeptide, GIP) (total) will be assessed.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Investigator), Primary Purpose: Basic Science
